summary.para: Indicates that the application no longer needs the session and the Content Decryption Module (CDM) should release any resources associated with the session and close it.

remarks.para: Close is based on the Encrypted Media Extension specification's MediaKeySession.close.

summary.para: Generates a license request based on the provided data.

param.name: initDataType
param.para: A LPCWSTR specifying the type of the data provided in the initData parameter. The string format is specified by the Encrypted Media Extension specification's Initialization Data Type.

param.name: initData
param.para: A BYTE array containing initialization data. The data format is specified by the Encrypted Media Extension specification's Initialization Data.

param.name: initDataSize
param.para: The size of the BYTE array provided in the initData parameter.

remarks.para: GenerateRequest is based on the Encrypted Media Extension specification's MediaKeySession.generateRequest.

summary.para: Gets the expiration time for all keys in the session as determined by the Content Decryption Module (CDM).

param.name: expiration
param.para: Receives a pointer to an LPWSTR representing the session ID or NaN if no such time exists or if the license explicitly never expires.

remarks.para: GetExpiration is based on the Encrypted Media Extension specification's MediaKeySession.expiration. The time and time range values of the expiration are based on ECMA Language Specification's Time Values and Time Range.

summary.para: Gets a reference to an array of structures that represent the key IDs known to the Content Decryption Module (CDM) session and the current status of the associated key.

param.name: keyStatuses
param.para: Receives a pointer to an array of structures containing the IDs and statuses of the keys known to the CDM session.

param.name: numKeyStatuses
param.para: Receives the number of structures present in the keyStatuses array.

returns.para: Returns S_OK. If an error occurs, the returned mey status list is empty.

remarks.para: GetKeyStatuses is based on the Encrypted Media Extension specification's MediaKeySession.keyStatuses.

summary.para: Gets a unique string identifier generated by the Content Decryption Module (CDM) that can be used by the application to identify session objects.

param.name: sessionId
param.para: Receives a pointer to an LPWSTR representing the session ID.

remarks.para: GetSessionId is based on the Encrypted Media Extension specification's MediaKeySession.sessionId.

summary.para: Loads the data for the specified session into the IMFContentDecryptionModuleSession object.

param.name: sessionId
param.para: The unique identifier of the session to load.

param.name: loaded
param.para: Receives a pointer to a BOOL indicating if the session data was loaded successfully.

remarks.para: Load is based on the Encrypted Media Extension specification's MediaKeySession.Load.

summary.para: Removes all licenses and keys associated with the session.

remarks.para: For persistent session types, other session data will be cleared as defined for each session type once a release message acknowledgment is processed by .
Remove is based on the Encrypted Media Extension specification's MediaKeySession.remove.

summary.para: Provides messages, including licenses, to the Content Decryption Module (CDM) session. Persisted data should not be released or cleared.

param.name: responseSize
param.para: The size of the BYTE array provided in the response parameter.

remarks.para: Update is based on the Encrypted Media Extension specification's MediaKeySession.update.

summary.para: Provides access to the Content Decryption Module (CDM) for encrypted media extensions support.

remarks.para: IMFContentDecryptionModuleSession is based on the Encrypted Media Extension specification's MediaKeySession.
